title: Eligibility*
content:
If you're a part-time or full-time team member, you're eligible for Auto and Home Insurance, LifeLock Identity Theft Protection Program, MetLife Legal Plans and Pet Insurance. To be eligible for Purchasing PowerÂ®, you must be a part-time or full-time team member who has been active for at least 12 months of service and earns at least $16,000 annually. You must also have a bank account or credit card (to be used for direct bill pay or in case of non-payment via payroll deduction).
